item.title: MMM
item.description: score:140 Chances: First-quarter results are trending better than expected. 3M Co. named aerospace veteran William Brown as its new chief executive officer, a move aimed at providing fresh direction for a company mired in mounting legal liabilities and a much-diminished stock price. In this piece, we will take a look at the 13 most undervalued dow stocks to buy according to analysts.
